title: 2D or 3D? (Poll)
body:
Hello fellow GDers and gamers. Do you prefer...

3D?

https://i.imgur.com/mzjKmVG.png

or

2D?

http://i.imgur.com/qrCwkjw.jpg
https://www.walldevil.com/wallpapers/w11/gensou-no-idea-nanami-naru-visual-novels-cleavage.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/iQ8EBdj.png

And why?

EDIT: Added more attractive options for 2D because people aren't faithful
